name: Passimian
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: They battle with hard berries for weapons. Their techniques are passed from the boss to the group, generation upon generation.

abilities.name: Power Huddle
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Passimian’s attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent’s Active Evolution Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rock Hurl
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.
